posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: MySQL常用命令
posts.text: 创建用户1CREATE USER 'username'@'host' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; host：指定该用户在哪个主机上可以登录 “localhost”：本地登录 “%”：远程登录 password：密码可以为空，如果为空则该用户可以不需要密码登录服务器 1234#创建用户名为activemq，可以远程登录，密码为activemq的用户create user 'activemq'@'%' identified by 'activemq';#创建用户名为dog，只可本地登录，无密码的用户create user 'dog'@'localhost' identified by ''; 授权1grant privileges on database_name.table_name to'username'@'host'; privileges：用户操作权限，如果授权所有权限使用all privileges 权限包括： select,insert,update,delete,create,drop references,index,alter,create temporary tables,lock tables,execute create view,show view,create routine,alter routine,event,trigger database_name：数据库名 table_name：表名，如果要授予该用户对所有数据库和表的相应操作权限则可用*表示，如*.* 1234#给activemq用户(可远程登录)数据库为activemq的所有表，赋予所有权限 grant all privileges on activemq.* to 'activemq'@'%';#给dog用户(本地登录)在mq数据库的所有表，赋予查询和新增的权限grant select,insert on mq.* to 'dog'@'localhost'; 修改密码1update mysql.user set authentication_string=password('root') where user='root'; 刷新权限1flush privileges; 导出数据库s12mysqldump -u username -p database_name > filemysqldump -u root -p news > news.sql 导入数据1234#切换数据库use db_name;#导入SQL文件数据source /data.sql; 快速删除数据库中所有表1SELECT concat('DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ', table_name, ';') FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'database_name';

posts.title: Linux 开发环境安装
posts.text: JDK 官网地址 rpm -ivh jdk-8u172-linux-x64.rpm cd /usr/java/jdk1.8.0_172-amd64 vim /etc/profile 配置环境变量 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jdk1.8.0_172-amd64 export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/rt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH 使配置生效 source /etc/profile Tomcat tar -zxvf apache-tomcat-7.0.88.tar.gz 修改conf/server.xml 增加 URIEncoding=”UTF-8” 修改防火墙配置，开放8080端口 CentOS 6 vim /etc/sysconfig/iptables -A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 8080 -j ACCEPT CentOS 7 firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=8080/tcp 重启防火墙 CentOS 6 service iptables restart CentOS 7 firewall-cmd --reload Maven tar -zxvf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz vim /etc/profile export MAVEN_HOME=/developer/apache-maven-3.3.9 export PATH=$MAVEN_HOME/bin:$PATH source /etc/profile 配置阿里云镜像 12345678910111213141516171819<mirror> <id>alimaven</id> <mirrorOf>central</mirrorOf> <name>aliyun maven</name> <url>http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public/</url></mirror><profile> <id>jdk-1.8</id> <activation> <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault> <jdk>1.8</jdk> </activation> <properties> <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source> <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target> <maven.compiler.compilerVersion>1.8</maven.compiler.compilerVersion> </properties></profile> Git 下载地址 安装编译源码所需依赖 yum -y install zlib-devel openssl-devel cpio expat-devel gettext-devel curl-devel perl-ExtUtils-CBuilder perl-ExtUtils- MakeMaker tar -zxvf git-2.23.0.tar.gz cd git-2.23.0/ make prefix=/usr/local/git all make prefix=/usr/local/git install vim /etc/profile export PATH=/usr/local/git/bin:$PATH source /etc/profile Git配置 git config --global user.name “XXX” git config --global user.email “XXX@XXX” git config --global core.autocrlf false git config --global core.quotepath off 配置代理： git config --global http.proxy 'socks5://127.0.0.1:1080' git config --global https.proxy 'socks5://127.0.0.1:1080' 查看git所有配置 git config --list 删除全局配置项 git config --global --unset user.name 编辑全局配置 git config --global --edit 配置SSH Key 进入~/.ssh 查看 ssh-keygen -m PEM -t rsa -C “XXX@XXX” cat id_rsa.pub Docker(CentOS 7) 官方文档 sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo sudo yum -y install docker-ce sudo mkdir -p /etc/docker sudo vim /etc/docker/daemon.json { “registry-mirrors”: [“https://4t0bob8f.mirror.aliyuncs.com"]} sudo systemctl daemon-reload sudo systemctl restart docker 将用户加入docker组 sudo gpasswd -a ${USER} docker CentOS 7防火墙相关 systemctl status firewalld #查看防火墙状态 firewall-cmd --list-all #查看防火墙规则 firewall-cmd --query-port=8080/tcp #查询端口是否开放 firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=80/tcp #开放80端口 firewall-cmd --permanent --remove-port=80/tcp #移除80端口 firewall-cmd --reload #重启防火墙(修改配置后要重启防火墙) iptables -S https://linuxconfig.org/redhat-8-open-http-port-80-and-https-port-443-with-firewalld firewall-cmd --zone=public --permanent --add-service=http firewall-cmd --zone=public --permanent --add-service=https
